Package multidendrograms.forms.scrollabledesktop

Class BaseInternalFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JInternalFrame
            • multidendrograms.forms.scrollabledesktop.BaseInternalFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DendrogramFrame
    public class BaseInternalFrame
extends javax.swing.JInternalFrame
    This class provides a custom internal frame. Each internal frame is assigned an associated toggle button and an optional radio button menu item. These buttons reside in the DesktopResizableToolBar and DesktopMenu. classes respectively.
    Version:
    1.0 9-Aug-2001
    Author:
    Tom Tessier, Francesco Furfari
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
        title - the string displayed in the title bar of the internal frame

        frameContents - the contents of the internal frame
        isClosable - determines whether the frame is closable

      • getInitialDimensions

        public java.awt.Dimension getInitialDimensions()
        returns the initial dimensions of this internal frame. Necessary so that internal frames can be restored to their default sizes when the cascade frame positioning mode is chosen in FramePositioning.
        Returns:
        the Dimension object representing the initial dimensions of this internal frame

      • addNotify

        public void addNotify()
        saves the size of the current internal frame for those frames whose initial width and heights have not been set. Called when the internal frame is added to the JDesktopPane.

        Manually-built internal frames won't display properly without this.

        Fix by Francesco Furfari
        Overrides:
        addNotify in class javax.swing.JComponent
